name: py-fusepy
description:
Fusepy is a Python module that provides a simple interface to FUSE and
MacFUSE. It's just one file and is implemented using ctypes.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: fuse
dependencies.description:
The reference implementation of the Linux FUSE (Filesystem in Userspace)
interface

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-dataset-runtime
dependent_to.description:
The purpose of this package is to coordinate dependencies within AzureML
packages. It is not intended for public use.
